title: Reading Explanation
text: When an audience focuses on reading, they often miss key parts of the spoken presentation because they are more focused on the words.

title: Keeping Audience Engaged
text: Your audience shouldn't be distracted by too much text on your slide, rather they should be engaged by your speaking.

title: Purpose of Visuals
text: If there are visuals included on the slide, it is likely that they will also see the visuals if they are reading off of the slide.
